name: Next.js Route: S3 List Objects
description: List S3 objects from a Route Handler.

files.template:
import { S3Client, ListObjectsV2Command } from '@aws-sdk/client-s3';
export async function GET(){ const s3 = new S3Client({}); const out = await s3.send(new ListObjectsV2Command({ Bucket: process.env.S3_BUCKET! })); return Response.json({ keys: (out.Contents||[]).map(o=>o.Key) }); }
